history.text: Have you seen the movie home alone
No, is it good?
it was a movie from 1990 and gave macaulay culkin his debut
how have you not seen this its a huge hit
Who else was in it?
joe pesci was a bad guy named harry
he actually got his hair burned off his head in the movie
Is it the movie wth the kid who booby traps his house?
it was pesci and his partner that tried to break into a house
yeah thats the movie
Was it highly rated?
theres one line where he plays a movie scene and it says get out of here you filthy animal hahha
What knds of things did reviewers say about it?
sadly it is only rated 5/10 on rotten tomatoes but this was an insanely huge hit when it debuted
Have you seen anything else by the director chris columus he does lots of comedies
Do you like comedies?
cinema score has a rating of A which is odd since the other sites say its a lower mid rated movie
daniel stern is marv joe pesci's partner in this movie
I dont think I have seen anything else with Chris Columus? What else did he direct?
This is a christmas movie and has a lost boy subject of the movie
Do you agree with the ratings the movie got?
They say the film is flat but if someone believes that then they have no sense of humor and probably shouldnt be doihng movie reviews
How does the boy become lost?
I think them turning kevin into a protector of his home when his family accidentally leaves him home when they go on vacation is just epic
have you seen any of the other movies in the series?
No, I don't beleve so. Have you?
kevin actually sets several booby traps to help deter the would be burglars.
do you remember when he smacked marv with the bowling ball to the face
he had it tied up top on a banister on the second floor and pushed them over when they came up the stairs
No! lol! That sound hilarious!
Do the burglars get revenge?

it was thats why i think that a critic who would watch this and say that an 8yr old with a movie budget should have come up with better pranks is just an ass wouldnt you agree i mean at least its realistic
they try to get revenge in the next movie when they come back the next year. these are christmas time movies also partly why they were such a hit
its a great comedy and i think it doesnt loose its interest for kids of that age
I wouldn't agree with that reviewer. An 8yr old with a movie budget would probably just spend it on ice cream. Did police get involved in any way? I cant remember?
the police didnt get involved until the end
they were on their way to paris when they realized they forgot kevin
Did Kevin get reunited with his family?
at the end of the movie when they got back to chicago
